channel.title: [easy]trader/transferer[easy]
channel.description:
here is my problem i need to transfer from my "autoing charicters" to my main and i dont have 2 computers next to eachother... but i have one upstairs and one downstairs..
so here is my solution.. a script that will keep game from closing while i walk downstairs and log in... then accept trade request and then accept trade..
i have seen things that will do this is srl but i am too lazy to learn to script
thanks in advance

item.title: [easy]trader/transferer[easy]
item.dc:creator: @Wolfeyes217 Wolfeyes217
item.description:
@Wolfeyes217 wrote:

it wont make a diffrence , you will still have the same Ip address… But I think you only will if you have a router

Read full topic

item.title: [easy]trader/transferer[easy]
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

[scar]Program StayLoggedIn;

var
x,y: integer;

begin
repeat
MoveMouseSmooth(random(500),random(500));
GetMousePos(x,y);
clickmouse(x,y,false);
wait(5000+random(2000));
until(false);
end;[/scar]

I think that the unsigned and signed thing is detectable

Read full topic
